**Announcement for Request for Proposal (RFP)**
#### System Analysis Services - Appeal System Plus (ASP)

The Courts Administration Service (CAS) invites qualified vendors to submit a proposal for System Analysis Services - Appeal System Plus (ASP), a requirement under the Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) - Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS). **Brief Description**

The CAS provides administrative services to four federal courts in Canada, and the court's mandate requires the development, support, and maintenance of the Appeal System Plus (ASP) application, a critical system for the Tax Court of Canada. This RFP seeks a programmer-analyst to work on this project, ensuring the delivery of quality services to support the Trial Division and the Tax Court of Canada.

**Key Facts**

* Tender Reference Number: **CB-5846-45162725**
* Amendment Number: **1**
* Solicitation Number: **5X001-23-0057**
* Tender Closing Date: **June 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)**
* Expected Contract Start Date: **June 19, 2023**
* Expected Contract End Date: **June 18, 2024**
* Notice URL: **None**
* Attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5846/5x001-23-0057_npp_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5846/5x001-23-0057_npp_eng.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5846/5x001-23-0057_npp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5846/5x001-23-0057_npp_fr.pdf) (French)

**Notice of Intent**

The notice of intent to procure these services was first published on May 30, 2023. This RFP is a procurement by electronic means and only qualified vendors can access the documents through the Canadian Government Electronic Tendering System. Bidders must be aware that the documents for this RFP are not accessible through the website `BUYANDSELL.GC.CA`.
